coverage_details.optical_frame: Frame Limit--SR1,000.00 (as part of optical limit)
coverage_details.organ_transplant: Covered including corneal, bone marrow; excluding organ and donor related costs
coverage_details.dental_general: SR 10,000.00. Crowns/bridges/post/core/implants covered up to dental limit. Scaling twice a year. In-patient dental cases: Deductible for A class only 10% up to 1,000 SR.
coverage_details.dental_corrective: Covered up to dental limit (crowns/bridges/post/core/non-precious metals, implants)
coverage_details.maternity: SR 20,000.00. Caesarean, legal abortion, complications covered up to limit. Epidural for normal delivery. Pregnancy vitamins. Preventive methods as per CHI up to 1,500 SR. Assisted/artificial pregnancies covered, costs of techniques/procedures not covered.
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,000.00. Frames and medical contact lenses included. No deductible. Lasik and correction up to 6,000 SR including Multifocal IOL. No age limit.
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-authorisation required for outpatient/inpatient services for VIP/VVIP members unless service has separate limit (e.g. dental, hearing aids, maternity, optical, kidney dialysis).
coverage_details.special_instructions: Allergy tests up to 4,000 SR. Allergy illness covered up to limit. All vitamins if prescribed. Work injuries. Artificial spine replacements. Sleep apnea. Visiting doctor up to 600 SR/day. Companion for male child <14yrs, female <20yrs. Psoriasis up to 500,000 SR. Medication limit = preauthorisation limit. Freestyle libra & other CGM & diabetes devices covered. Crutches, back belts, assistive devices if medical need. Full coverage for all medically necessary exams/tests. Hormone testing/all hormone analysis covered. Preventive screening as per CHI. Contraceptives up to 1,500 SR. Speech therapy (non-autism) up to 10,000 SR. Joint replacement as per CHI. Obesity up to 20,000 SR (Nil deductible). Coverage for congenital/deformities (all).
